item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

I am currently adding an interface stuck at adding hovered buttons/buttons

	addHoverButton(1903, "Interfaces/Shop/SIR", 1, 162, 75, "Buy Item", -1, 1904, 1);
        addHoveredButton(1904, "Interfaces/Shop/SIR", 2, 162, 75, 1905);

someone explain how this works please -.-
